title: How to watch Boruto: Naruto Next Generations anime - Quora

response.answer_text: Well if you are a fan of Boruto anime, you sure do not want go miss any part of the weekly episodes. With Shin Uchiha’s identity presently elusive, it will be great to see how things play out as the weeks go on. One channel i will recommend for you to subscribe to is: BORUTO HQ This channel is going to feed you with loads of content from present Boruto episodes while refreshing your memory on events and fights from Naruto Shippuden. Definitely, you know there are lots of interlink between the two animes. Check out the current sets of videos on the channel. Episode 23 is now available for watching on the channel. From managers of the channel, I hear that ALL EPISODES ARE PRESENTLY BEING UPLOADED! Like, comment, and subscribe. Thank you!

If you're a college student, then by purchasing Spotify for 5$ a month you can get Hulu included at no extra charge. Which has a plethora of anime included, like Boruto. Crunchyroll is also an excellent source.
